title: Less than half of students went to class regularly in term three - Ministry figures
transTitle: 教育部数据显示，第三学期只有不到一半的学生定期上课

title: Cyclone-damaged roads and highways breaking up just weeks after being repaired
transTitle: 被飓风损坏的道路和高速公路在修复几周后就破裂了

title: Queenstown Shotover wastewater treatment plant's new problem leaves a foul smell
transTitle: 皇后镇沙特欧瓦污水处理厂新问题留下恶臭

title: Convicted fraudster claimed lawyer overcharged, pursued him through courts for 15 years
transTitle: 被定罪的诈骗犯声称律师多收费，通过法庭追捕他15年

title: Police arrest man after West Auckland searches turn up firearms, ammunition and explosives
transTitle: 西奥克兰搜查发现枪支、弹药和爆炸物后警方逮捕了一名男子

title: Krysten Cottrell named Farah Palmer Cup player of the year at NZ Rugby Awards
transTitle: 克里斯滕·科特雷尔 (Krysten Cottrell) 被评为新西兰橄榄球奖年度法拉·帕尔默杯 (Farah Palmer Cup) 球员

title: Seaview stench: Wellington council issues fines over wastewater plant’s sickening smell
transTitle: 海景恶臭：惠灵顿议会因污水处理厂发出令人作呕的气味而处以罚款

title: School truancy: Less than half of Kiwi kids went to school regularly in Term 3, says Ministry of Education
transTitle: 逃学现象：教育部表示，不到一半的新西兰孩子在第三学期正常上学

title: Taranaki farm equipment dealer who stole $360k off 25 customers sent to jail
transTitle: 塔拉纳基农场设备经销商从 25 名顾客那里偷走了 36 万美元，被判入狱

title: Fire on Māngere Mountain: Three arrested after large scrub blaze
transTitle: Māngere 山火灾：大片灌木丛大火后三人被捕

title: Stalled cycling and walking project in Taranaki will not receive more funding - Transport Minister
transTitle: 交通部长：塔拉纳基停滞的自行车和步行项目将不会获得更多资金

title: Three arrests after series of fires on Māngere Mountain in Auckland
transTitle: 奥克兰 Māngere 山发生系列火灾后，三人被捕

title: Auckland homeowner questions why storm-damaged property not included in support package
transTitle: 奥克兰房主质疑为什么风暴受损的房产没有包含在支持计划中

title: Police seize stash of firearms, ammunition at Auckland property
transTitle: 警方在奥克兰房产查获藏匿的枪支弹药
